name: GamesCage Simulator 2022
description:
GamesCage Simulator 2022 is a "hyper-realistic simulation" of Fadel GamesCage's real-life experiences. Take a step in Fadel's shoes and fight through his most common opponents like Bri'ish Fake-Del, Chao, and Mudkip with some (quite frankly) mundane attacks! There's even a timer for you speedrunning freaks out there because I know yall will cheese this game within minutes.  Controllers are pretty much required, so grab your controller and step into the VERY MUCH REALISTIC (I SWEAR) world of GamesCage Simulator 2022!

This game was made for the Fadel Direct on October 7, 2021. 

Fadel Direct: (LINK NOT YET AVAILABLE)
